code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Box,Stack,Typography}from"@mui/material";import{fetchFromAPI}from"../utils/fetchFromAPI";import{Videos,Sidebar}from"./";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Feed=()=>{const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState("New");const[videos,setVideos]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{setVideos(null);fetchFromAPI("search?part=snippet&q=".concat(selectedCategory)).then(data=>setVideos(data.items));},[selectedCategory]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{sx:{flexDirection:{sx:"column",md:"row"}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{height:{sx:"auto",md:"92vh"},borderRight:"1px solid #3d3d3d",px:{sx:0,md:2}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{selectedCategory:selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory:setSelectedCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{className:"copyright",variant:"body2",sx:{mt:1.5,color:"#fff"},children:"Copyright \xA9 2022 JSM Media"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{p:2,sx:{overflowY:"auto",height:"90vh",flex:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h4",fontWeight:"bold",mb:2,sx:{color:"white"},children:[selectedCategory," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#FC1503"},children:"videos"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{videos:videos})]})]});};export default Feed;
